body: thanks for the summary, minminazusa! nice!

Raizu and Mari are friends from the same part time job. Both loves to play not-SmashBros and became close friends. One day, Mari came wearing mini skirt and knee socks, and that bothered Raizu enough he can't hold back. After the blowjob, he actually asks to continue their game session, but she thought he meant continue with sex. After that first round, Mari thought she lost her game pal now, since they wouldn't be able to be together without remembering the sex, it's gonna be awkward. She also admitted, she intentionally provoke Raizu with the mini skirt because he doesn't see her with lust like other men. In the second round, he failed to pull out, and that pissed her off. While he thought she won't play with him anymore, today she came, with mini skirt and knee socks (code for lets have sex again) before having more game matches.

Despite the NTR, i love this author's drawings, because he shows girls having really fun while having sex.
It is just like the gentle orc and pervy elf author.
I need a English translation or a Chinese translation!!!!
E N G L I S H   T R A N S L A T I O N
Lmaooooo it's Maika from Isekai AV, didn't know the author also does hentai.
If you ask for translations, you will die.
Really like the art style, translation please!
